channel.title: Redmi Note 12 5G MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi Note 12 5G MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.2.0.UMQTWXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 12 5G Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 12 5G Taiwan

Codename: sunstone

Version: OS1.0.2.0.UMQTWXM | 14.0

Size: 5.5 GB

MD5: 0d10956ab70d5616f273d587d18c22f3

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Single-line notification icons were not fully displayed
Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed
Fix: The 5G icon in the status bar wasn't fully displayed after switching font size or changing to a third party font

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.3.0.UMQCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 12 5G / Note 12R Pro China
